page.title: 18TOURISM
page.content: The tourist industry in this area has increased a great deal in recent years. There are four hotels, two inns and sixteen houses doing bed and breakfast. The average cost for an overnight stay at a hotel is Â£13.00 or Â£10.00 at a B & B. Altogether there is room for 181 guests in Campden. Most of the foreign visitors are American and interviews suggest that they visit because they have heard that it is a beautiful town. On average, they stay for a week during which time they tour the Cotswolds and visit Stratford. In Campden the church of St James has a splendid exterior but a rather dull interior. Outside is the ruin of Campden House burnt in the Civil War and opposite are the Almshouses built by Sir Baptist Hicks who built the Market Hall.The High Street contains the most beautiful buildings of all.
